summary:
This mod adds a new shout. It undress target or yourself.

You can learn/unlearn this shout at behind Breezehome in Whiterun.

NOW, RELEASE YOURSELF! RELEASE THEM ALL!
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DESCRIPTION:
This mod adds a new shout.
Shout Effects are below:
- level 1: undress completely targets
- level 2: undress completely shouter
- level 3: undress completely targets and shouter

You can learn/unlearn this shout at behind Breezehome in Whiterun.

NOW, RELEASE YOURSELF! RELEASE THEM ALL!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CAUTION:
You need a word of power \'Fus\'.
You should save game before to use this mod.
Beware of bugs or glithes, if those exist.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION:
Copy .esp file and .bsa file to Data folder. or use NMM.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UNINSTALLTION:
Delete .esp file and .bsa file. or use NMM.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HISTORY:
1.0
-Initial release.
author: longod
